channel.title: My First Album (BlåMeese)
channel.description:
I’ve finally released my first album “The Heavens” on Spotify!!! I’d really appreciate it if you’d share it! Auxy helped make all the music so I wanted to say thank you to @Auxy and @Fredrik for making such an awesome app! Also, I wanted to say thank you to @Lex for working on “Earth” with me! 😁🎉
Here’s the Spotify link!😉:
https://open.spotify.com/album/3JGfnXQorQDpdiSKhYH2Mh?si=FFdGUnarTy6fJcIerEECwg

item.title: My First Album (BlåMeese)
item.dc:creator: BlaMeese
item.description:
Thank you! That means a lot to me. I liked the moose but it just wasn’t working. I guess it’s gonna end up as an inside joke.

Read full topic

item.title: My First Album (BlåMeese)
item.dc:creator: Bassment_Chemists
item.description:
I started following you on spotify and remember back when you profile on disco was a moose. I miss the moose. I am listening to the album as I fall asleep, its so calm and cheery, hope it brings me the best of dreams

Read full topic

item.title: My First Album (BlåMeese)
item.dc:creator: BlaMeese
item.description:
I’ve finally released my first album “The Heavens” on Spotify!!! I’d really appreciate it if you’d share it!
Auxy helped make all the music so I wanted to say thank you to @Auxy and @Fredrik for making such an awesome app! Also, I wanted to say thank you to @Lex for working on “Earth” with me!

Here’s the Spotify link!:

https://open.spotify.com/album/3JGfnXQorQDpdiSKhYH2Mh?si=FFdGUnarTy6fJcIerEECwg
